issue.title: [Go] Enable -race argument for Go tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13979](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13979). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Enabling the -race argument on non-windows OS's ensures we test for race conditions when running the tests.
